title: Carrot Soup
directions: Take a large saucepan, add oil and curry powder to it.
Stir for 2 minutes and add carrots, celery and onion.
Cook for 10 minutes and stir in the broth.
Reduce the heat and simmer until the vegetables turn soft.
Remove from the heat and let it stand for 10 minutes.
Lay a paper towel over the soup to blot the excess oil that has risen to the top.
Transfer the soup into the blender and pour the puree in the pan.
Simmer it on medium flame and serve hot.
One of the best soups for weight loss!
